metadata.title: CVE-2023-3635 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: GzipSource does not handle an exception that might be raised when parsing amalformed gzip buffer. This may lead to denial of service of the Okioclient when handling a crafted GZIP archive, by using the GzipSource class.

criterions.comment: okio package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
